titles.title: Honoring the life and contributions of the late Dr. John B. Tsu for his dedication and service to the United States of America through many high-level boards and commissions and for his service on behalf of the Asian Pacific American community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/10/2005--Introduced. Honors the life of the late Dr. John B. Tsu for his dedication and service to the United States, service to the Asian Pacific American community, and lifetime of work as an educator who helped to promote Asian Pacific American leaders.
